page.title: 05Family Life
page.content: The 'Whitfield' family generally rise at 0730 and then half an hour later they have their breakfast of cereal and toast. When the 2 children have been taken to school in the car, both parents then go off to work. At 1300 hours, they have their lunch which is usually a main meal. The 'Whitfield' family have 2 pets. When the 2 children get home from school, if it is Friday, the weekly shopping will probably be done. Before tea the children might go to the Village hall for some kind of club but are definitely back by 1800 for their tea which is usually a snack. After this they might play on the computer or watch the video. Before they goto bed at 2045 the children, if it is a Friday will be given their #1 pocket money. They will soon be followed by the adults who usually go to bed at 2230.
